=Usage Started=

==Tools==

===Command Line Interfaces (CLI)===

====BookPublisherCLI====

class: 

net.mitnet.tools.pdf.book.publisher.ui.cli.BookPublisherCLI

purpose: 

creates final PDF book

usage: 

{{{
BookPublisherCLI -v -i <input-dir> -o <output-dir> -b <output-pdf-book>
}}}

====OpenOfficeDocConverterCLI====

class 

net.mitnet.tools.pdf.openoffice.ui.cli.OpenOfficeDocConverterCLI

purpose: 

converts ODT to PDF (by default)

usage: 

{{{
OpenOfficeDocConverterCLI -v -i <input-dir> -o <output-dir>
}}}


====PdfBookBuilderCLI====

class: 

net.mitnet.tools.pdf.pdf.builder.ui.cli.PdfBookBuilderCLI

purpose: 

builds PDF book from PDF files

usage: 

{{{
PdfBookBuilderCLI -v -i <input-dir> -o -b <output-pdf-book>
}}}
